summary: The comment section is highly critical of Douglas Murray, with a strong presence of sarcasm and anger. Comments frequently question his credibility and expertise, especially regarding Middle-East politics and his predictions about the Ukraine war. There's a notable mention of his IDF sponsorship and criticism of Islam without proper credentials. The tone is overwhelmingly negative, with a high controversy score indicating polarized views. The discussion also touches on Joe Rogan and Dave Smith's interactions with Murray, highlighting moments perceived as Murray's failures or exposures. The section reflects a deep skepticism towards Murray's journalistic integrity and expertise.
title: Joe Rogan Mocks Pro-Israeli Douglas Murray
